A.J. "BoonDock" McIntyre
Mark "Cornbread" Bryant
Dez
Chris Hood
Rich "Sloppy Jones" Williamson
Doyle "Dreadneck" Williams | past_members = }} '''Jawga Boyz''' is an American [[country rap]] group formed in [[Athens, Georgia]] in 2003.{{cite web|last=Jeffries|first=David|title=Jawga Boyz {{!}} Biography & History|url={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=mn0002911507/biography|pure_url=yes}}|work=[[AllMusic]]|accessdate=May 13, 2016}} The current lineup is D Thrash, BoonDock, Cornbread, Dez, Chris Hood, Sloppy Jones, and Dreadneck. They have released four studio albums including 2014's ''Tailgate Music'', which debuted at number 155 on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]], number 22 on the Country Albums chart and number 17 on the [[Rap Albums]] chart. Steve Leggett of [[AllMusic]] gave ''Tailgate Music'' a favorable review, writing that it "keeps the fun and quality up, showing once again what this Dirty South hip-hop country rock thing is all about, and doing it all with engaging energy and intensity.The Group has Disbanded and hasn't released songs in a number of years"{{cite web|last=Leggett|first=Steve|title=''Tailgate Music'' review|url={{Allmusic|class=album|id=mw0002714946|pure_url=yes}}|work=[[AllMusic]]|accessdate=May 13, 2016}} In 2013, Thrasher wrote and recorded a song with [[Joe Diffie]], "Girl Ridin' Shotgun". In response to [[Jason Aldean]]s song "[[1994 (song)|1994]]" {{cite news|last1=Dukes|first1=Billy|title=The Real Joe Diffie Releases 'Girl Ridin' Shotgun' Video, a Response to '1994'|url=http://tasteofcountry.com/joe-diffie-girl-ridin-shotgun-video/|accessdate=May 13, 2016|work=Taste of Country|date=June 21, 2013}} Their song "Chillin in the Backwoods" feat. Young Gunner currently has over 80 million views on YouTube.
